00027 // Note To Mods //
00028 /*
00029 Please do not change anything here and release it..
00030 There is going to be a new forum created just for the Kademlia side of the client..
00031 If you feel there is an error or a way to improve something, please
00032 post it in the forum first and let us look at it.. If it is a real improvement,
00033 it will be added to the offical client.. Changing something without knowing
00034 what all it does can cause great harm to the network if released in mass form..
00035 Any mod that changes anything within the Kademlia side will not be allowed to advertise
00036 there client on the eMule forum..
00037 */

00049 struct SSearchTerm;
00050 class CFileDataIO;
00051 
00053 namespace Kademlia {
00055 
00056 class CEntry
00057 {
00058 protected:
00059     struct sFileNameEntry {
00060         wxString m_filename;
00061         uint32_t m_popularityIndex;
00062     };
00063 
00064 public:
00065     CEntry()
00066     {
00067         m_uIP = 0;
00068         m_uTCPport = 0;
00069         m_uUDPport = 0;
00070         m_uSize = 0;
00071         m_tLifeTime = time(NULL);
00072         m_bSource = false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     virtual     ~CEntry();
00076     virtual CEntry* Copy() const;
00077     virtual bool    IsKeyEntry() const throw()  { return false; }
00078     
00079     bool     GetIntTagValue(const wxString& tagname, uint64_t& value, bool includeVirtualTags = true) const;
00080     wxString GetStrTagValue(const wxString& tagname) const;
00081 
00082     void     AddTag(CTag *tag)          { m_taglist.push_back(tag); }
00083     uint32_t GetTagCount() const            { return m_taglist.size() + ((m_uSize != 0) ? 1 : 0) + (GetCommonFileName().IsEmpty() ? 0 : 1); }
00084     void     WriteTagList(CFileDataIO* data)    { WriteTagListInc(data, 0); }
00085 
00086     wxString GetCommonFileNameLowerCase() const { return GetCommonFileName().MakeLower(); }
00087     wxString GetCommonFileName() const;
00088     void     SetFileName(const wxString& name);
00089 
00090     uint32_t m_uIP;
00091     uint16_t m_uTCPport;
00092     uint16_t m_uUDPport;
00093     CUInt128 m_uKeyID;
00094     CUInt128 m_uSourceID;
00095     uint64_t m_uSize;
00096     time_t m_tLifeTime;
00097     bool m_bSource;
00098 
00099 protected:
00100     void    WriteTagListInc(CFileDataIO *data, uint32_t increaseTagNumber = 0);
00101     typedef std::list<sFileNameEntry>   FileNameList;
00102     FileNameList    m_filenames;
00103     TagPtrList  m_taglist;
00104 };
00105 
00106 class CKeyEntry : public CEntry
00107 {
00108       protected:
00109     struct sPublishingIP {
00110         uint32_t m_ip;
00111         time_t   m_lastPublish;
00112     };
00113 
00114       public:
00115     CKeyEntry();
00116     virtual ~CKeyEntry();
00117 
00118     virtual CEntry* Copy() const            { return CEntry::Copy(); }
00119     virtual bool    IsKeyEntry() const throw()  { return true; }
00120 
00121     bool    SearchTermsMatch(const SSearchTerm *searchTerm) const;
00122     void    MergeIPsAndFilenames(CKeyEntry* fromEntry);
00123     void    CleanUpTrackedPublishers();
00124     double  GetTrustValue();
00125     void    WritePublishTrackingDataToFile(CFileDataIO *data);
00126     void    ReadPublishTrackingDataFromFile(CFileDataIO *data);
00127     void    DirtyDeletePublishData();
00128     void    WriteTagListWithPublishInfo(CFileDataIO *data);
00129     static void ResetGlobalTrackingMap()    { s_globalPublishIPs.clear(); }
00130 
00131       protected:
00132     void    ReCalculateTrustValue();
00133     static void AdjustGlobalPublishTracking(uint32_t ip, bool increase, const wxString& dbgReason);
00134 
00135     typedef std::list<sPublishingIP>    PublishingIPList;
00136     typedef std::map<uint32_t, uint32_t>    GlobalPublishIPMap;
00137 
00138     uint32_t m_lastTrustValueCalc;
00139     double   m_trustValue;
00140     PublishingIPList *      m_publishingIPs;
00141     static GlobalPublishIPMap   s_globalPublishIPs; // tracks count of publishings for each 255.255.255.0/24 subnet
00142 };

00144 }
